Combos.name: Hand Pad Combo
Combos.description: This is a combo using the hand pad.

moves.name: 1. jab, left-block, jab, straight, left-hook, straight
moves.description: 1. jab, left-block, jab, straight, left-hook, straight

moves.name: 2. Right-body block, right-uppercut, left-hook, straight, right-duck
moves.description: 2. Right-body block, right-uppercut, left-hook, straight, right-duck

moves.name: 3. Straight, left-hook, left-hook, straight, lean-back, straight, left-hook, straight, pull, straight, left-hook, straight
moves.description: 3. Straight, left-hook, left-hook, straight, lean-back, straight, left-hook, straight, pull, straight, left-hook, straight

moves.name: 4. Left-block, straight, left-hook, left-hook, left-uppercut, left-hook, right-hook
moves.description: 4. Left-block, straight, left-hook, left-hook, left-uppercut, left-hook, right-hook

moves.name: 5. Left-uppercut, right-uppercut, left-uppercut, right-uppercut, left-hook, right-hook
moves.description: 5. Left-uppercut, right-uppercut, left-uppercut, right-uppercut, left-hook, right-hook

Combos.name: Kick Pad Fast Combo
Combos.description: This is really fast combo using the kickpads.
